synthesize.translation[0].definitions[0]: to make something by combining different things or substances
DDT is a pesticide that was first synthesized in 1874.
synthesize.translation[0].definitions[1]: to combine separate things into a complete whole
synthesize.translation[0].definitions[2]: to produce sounds, speech, or music electronically
synthesize.translation[1].definitions[0]: to produce something by combining different things, especially to create something that is similar to a natural product
Researchers first synthesized the anti-depressant drug in 1972.
The technique may allow scientists to synthesize large diamonds more cheaply than they can be mined.
